Title Percutaneous Implantation of Infusion Port. right. 2. Procedure After skin preparation of right clavicular region on supine position, a 6 ml of 1% lidocaine HCI was locally infiltrated. The right internal jugular vein was punctured with a micropucture needle under US-guidance and a microsheath was then introduced into superior vena cava over a 0.018-inch hairwire. The skin was incised and subcutaneous pocket & tunnel was prepared by dissection. After dilation, an infusion port with catheter was inserted over a guidewire and a peel-away sheath. The tip of the catheter was adjusted at the atriocaval junction and the infusion port was filled with a 10 ml of saline solution mixed with Heparin 1.000 units for locking. The incision site was closed by applying tissue adhesive. The patient tolerated the procedure well and no immediate complication developed. [CONCLUSION] Uncomplicated implantation of infusion port via right transjugular venous approach under US & fluoroscopy. Title Percutaneous Implantation of Infusion Port. right. 2. Procedure After skin preparation of right clavicular region on supine position, a 6 ml of 1% lidocaine HCI was locally infiltrated. The right internal jugular vein was punctured with a micropucture needle under US-guidance and a microsheath was then introduced into superior vena cava over a 0.018-inch hairwire. The skin was incised and subcutaneous pocket & tunnel was prepared by dissection. After dilation, an infusion port with catheter was inserted over a guidewire and a peel-away sheath. The tip of the catheter was adjusted at the atriocaval junction and the infusion port was filled with a 10 ml of saline solution mixed with Heparin 1.000 units for locking. The incision site was closed by applying tissue adhesive. The patient tolerated the procedure well and no immediate complication developed. [CONCLUSION] Uncomplicated implantation of infusion port via right transjugular venous approach under US & fluoroscopy. Title Percutaneous Implantation of Infusion Port. right. 2. Procedure After skin preparation of right clavicular region on supine position, a 6 ml of 1% lidocaine HCI was locally infiltrated. The right internal jugular vein was punctured with a micropucture needle under US-guidance and a microsheath was then introduced into superior vena cava over a 0.018-inch hairwire. The skin was incised and subcutaneous pocket & tunnel was prepared by dissection. After dilation, an infusion port with catheter was inserted over a guidewire and a peel-away sheath. The tip of the catheter was adjusted at the atriocaval junction and the infusion port was filled with a 10 ml of saline solution mixed with Heparin 1.000 units for locking. The incision site was closed by applying tissue adhesive. The patient tolerated the procedure well and no immediate complication developed. [CONCLUSION] Uncomplicated implantation of infusion port via right transjugular venous approach under US & fluoroscopy. Title Percutaneous Implantation of Infusion Port. right. 2. Procedure After skin preparation of right clavicular region on supine position, a 6 ml of 1% lidocaine HCI was locally infiltrated. The right internal jugular vein was punctured with a micropucture needle under US-guidance and a microsheath was then introduced into superior vena cava over a 0.018-inch hairwire. The skin was incised and subcutaneous pocket & tunnel was prepared by dissection. After dilation, an infusion port with catheter was inserted over a guidewire and a peel-away sheath. The tip of the catheter was adjusted at the atriocaval junction and the infusion port was filled with a 10 ml of saline solution mixed with Heparin 1.000 units for locking. The incision site was closed by applying tissue adhesive. The patient tolerated the procedure well and no immediate complication developed. [CONCLUSION] Uncomplicated implantation of infusion port via right transjugular venous approach under US & fluoroscopy. Title Percutaneous Implantation of Infusion Port. right. 2. Procedure After skin preparation of right clavicular region on supine position, a 6 ml of 1% lidocaine HCI was locally infiltrated. The right internal jugular vein was punctured with a micropucture needle under US-guidance and a microsheath was then introduced into superior vena cava over a 0.018-inch hairwire. The skin was incised and subcutaneous pocket & tunnel was prepared by dissection. After dilation, an infusion port with catheter was inserted over a guidewire and a peel-away sheath. The tip of the catheter was adjusted at the atriocaval junction and the infusion port was filled with a 10 ml of saline solution mixed with Heparin 1.000 units for locking. The incision site was closed by applying tissue adhesive. The patient tolerated the procedure well and no immediate complication developed. [CONCLUSION] Uncomplicated implantation of infusion port via right transjugular venous approach under US & fluoroscopy. Title Percutaneous Implantation of Infusion Port. right. 2. Procedure After skin preparation of right clavicular region on supine position, a 6 ml of 1% lidocaine HCI was locally infiltrated. The right internal jugular vein was punctured with a micropucture needle under US-guidance and a microsheath was then introduced into superior vena cava over a 0.018-inch hairwire. The skin was incised and subcutaneous pocket & tunnel was prepared by dissection. After dilation, an infusion port with catheter was inserted over a guidewire and a peel-away sheath. The tip of the catheter was adjusted at the atriocaval junction and the infusion port was filled with a 10 ml of saline solution mixed with Heparin 1.000 units for locking. The incision site was closed by applying tissue adhesive. The patient tolerated the procedure well and no immediate complication developed. [CONCLUSION] Uncomplicated implantation of infusion port via right transjugular venous approach under US & fluoroscopy. Title Percutaneous Implantation of Infusion Port. right. 2. Procedure After skin preparation of right clavicular region on supine position, a 6 ml of 1% lidocaine HCI was locally infiltrated. The right internal jugular vein was punctured with a micropucture needle under US-guidance and a microsheath was then introduced into superior vena cava over a 0.018-inch hairwire. The skin was incised and subcutaneous pocket & tunnel was prepared by dissection. After dilation, an infusion port with catheter was inserted over a guidewire and a peel-away sheath. The tip of the catheter was adjusted at the atriocaval junction and the infusion port was filled with a 10 ml of saline solution mixed with Heparin 1.000 units for locking. The incision site was closed by applying tissue adhesive. The patient tolerated the procedure well and no immediate complication developed. [CONCLUSION] Uncomplicated implantation of infusion port via right transjugular venous approach under US & fluoroscopy. Title Percutaneous Implantation of Infusion Port. right. 2. Procedure After skin preparation of right clavicular region on supine position, a 6 ml of 1% lidocaine HCI was locally infiltrated. The right internal jugular vein was punctured with a micropucture needle under US-guidance and a microsheath was then introduced into superior vena cava over a 0.018-inch hairwire. The skin was incised and subcutaneous pocket & tunnel was prepared by dissection. After dilation, an infusion port with catheter was inserted over a guidewire and a peel-away sheath. The tip of the catheter was adjusted at the atriocaval junction and the infusion port was filled with a 10 ml of saline solution mixed with Heparin 1.000 units for locking. The incision site was closed by applying tissue adhesive. The patient tolerated the procedure well and no immediate complication developed. [CONCLUSION] Uncomplicated implantation of infusion port via right transjugular venous approach under US & fluoroscopy. LCT C/sec (Low cervical transverse cesarean section) [마취종류] D() Regional anesthesia, spinal block 마취종류(부): [수술의사] 집도의: 권지영 보조의: 없음 [수술소견] Baby was out at 2024-10-22 15:07 Single cephalic presentation LF 2.385kg Apgar score (8/9) No gross anomaly. No neck cord coiling. Not meconium stained. Placenta was expelled out by manual traction No defect No calcification. C.Uteri AV, full term size, no myoma Adnexae Grossly normal Intrapelvic cavity: no abonormal fluid accumulated. Other internal organ small amounts of ascites was found No drain, no transfusion during Op. EBL 500cc Under spinal anesthesia Pfannenstiel skin incision Painbuster was inserted [수술과정] The patient was placed in supine position. The skin of the whole abdomen and pubic area were prepared with povidine and sterile drapperies in routine manners. Under spinal anesthesia, the abdomen was opened through Pfannenstiel skin incision which was carried down to peritoneum. Upon the entry of the abdominal cavity, 2 Richardson retractors and long surgical tap were inserted for the bowel preparation and Op field. Then vesicouterine fold was identified. A short transverse incision which was extended in both direction on the lower uterine segment was made with Metzenbaum scissors. Thereafter, the transverse myometrial incision was made on the uterine segment and it was extended laterally by finger traction. Then baby was delivered from the head immediately by gentle guide and extra abdominal compression. The incised corner of the uterus was clamped with sponge forceps. Rapid closure and bleeding control was performed at this space. Endometrium and myometrium was closed in continuous running suture with 1-0 vicryl. Disrupted uterine serosa were repaired by vicryl. And the remaining abdominal wall was closed layer by layer in the routine manner. LCT C/sec (Low cervical transverse cesarean section) [마취종류] D() Regional anesthesia, spinal block 마취종류(부): [수술의사] 집도의: 권지영 보조의: 없음 [수술소견] Baby was out at 2024-10-22 15:07 Single cephalic presentation LF 2.385kg Apgar score (8/9) No gross anomaly. No neck cord coiling. Not meconium stained. Placenta was expelled out by manual traction No defect No calcification. C.Uteri AV, full term size, no myoma Adnexae Grossly normal Intrapelvic cavity: no abonormal fluid accumulated. Other internal organ small amounts of ascites was found No drain, no transfusion during Op. EBL 500cc Under spinal anesthesia Pfannenstiel skin incision Painbuster was inserted [수술과정] The patient was placed in supine position. The skin of the whole abdomen and pubic area were prepared with povidine and sterile drapperies in routine manners. Under spinal anesthesia, the abdomen was opened through Pfannenstiel skin incision which was carried down to peritoneum. Upon the entry of the abdominal cavity, 2 Richardson retractors and long surgical tap were inserted for the bowel preparation and Op field. Then vesicouterine fold was identified. A short transverse incision which was extended in both direction on the lower uterine segment was made with Metzenbaum scissors. Thereafter, the transverse myometrial incision was made on the uterine segment and it was extended laterally by finger traction. Then baby was delivered from the head immediately by gentle guide and extra abdominal compression. The incised corner of the uterus was clamped with sponge forceps. Rapid closure and bleeding control was performed at this space. Endometrium and myometrium was closed in continuous running suture with 1-0 vicryl. Disrupted uterine serosa were repaired by vicryl. And the remaining abdominal wall was closed layer by layer in the routine manner. During the operation, the patient was tolerable and sent to the recovery room after operation. 특이사항 및 합병증: No 조직검사: No [추정 출혈량] 500cc 배액: No [입원] 작성자: 권지영 Surgeon : 권지영 페이지: 1/ 1 : 2025/01/07 15:45:33 이미숙 의무기록팀 가톨릭대학교 은평성모병원 THE CATHOLIC UNIV. LCT C/sec (Low cervical transverse cesarean section) [마취종류] D() Regional anesthesia, spinal block 마취종류(부): [수술의사] 집도의: 권지영 보조의: 없음 [수술소견] Baby was out at 2024-10-22 15:07 Single cephalic presentation LF 2.385kg Apgar score (8/9) No gross anomaly. No neck cord coiling. Not meconium stained. Placenta was expelled out by manual traction No defect No calcification. C.Uteri AV, full term size, no myoma Adnexae Grossly normal Intrapelvic cavity: no abonormal fluid accumulated. Other internal organ small amounts of ascites was found No drain, no transfusion during Op. EBL 500cc Under spinal anesthesia Pfannenstiel skin incision Painbuster was inserted [수술과정] The patient was placed in supine position. The skin of the whole abdomen and pubic area were prepared with povidine and sterile drapperies in routine manners. Under spinal anesthesia, the abdomen was opened through Pfannenstiel skin incision which was carried down to peritoneum. Upon the entry of the abdominal cavity, 2 Richardson retractors and long surgical tap were inserted for the bowel preparation and Op field. Then vesicouterine fold was identified. A short transverse incision which was extended in both direction on the lower uterine segment was made with Metzenbaum scissors. Thereafter, the transverse myometrial incision was made on the uterine segment and it was extended laterally by finger traction. Then baby was delivered from the head immediately by gentle guide and extra abdominal compression. The incised corner of the uterus was clamped with sponge forceps. Rapid closure and bleeding control was performed at this space. Endometrium and myometrium was closed in continuous running suture with 1-0 vicryl. Disrupted uterine serosa were repaired by vicryl. And the remaining abdominal wall was closed layer by layer in the routine manner. During the operation, the patient was tolerable and sent to the recovery room after operation. 특이사항 및 합병증: No 조직검사: No [추정 출혈량] 500cc 배액: No [입원] 작성자: 권지영 Surgeon : 권지영 페이지: 1/ 1 : 2025/01/07 15:45:33 이미숙 의무기록팀 가톨릭대학교 은평성모병원 THE CATHOLIC UNIV. LCT C/sec (Low cervical transverse cesarean section) [마취종류] D() Regional anesthesia, spinal block 마취종류(부): [수술의사] 집도의: 권지영 보조의: 없음 [수술소견] Baby was out at 2024-10-22 15:07 Single cephalic presentation LF 2.385kg Apgar score (8/9) No gross anomaly. No neck cord coiling. Not meconium stained. Placenta was expelled out by manual traction No defect No calcification. C.Uteri AV, full term size, no myoma Adnexae Grossly normal Intrapelvic cavity: no abonormal fluid accumulated. Other internal organ small amounts of ascites was found No drain, no transfusion during Op. EBL 500cc Under spinal anesthesia Pfannenstiel skin incision Painbuster was inserted [수술과정] The patient was placed in supine position. The skin of the whole abdomen and pubic area were prepared with povidine and sterile drapperies in routine manners. Under spinal anesthesia, the abdomen was opened through Pfannenstiel skin incision which was carried down to peritoneum. Upon the entry of the abdominal cavity, 2 Richardson retractors and long surgical tap were inserted for the bowel preparation and Op field. Then vesicouterine fold was identified. A short transverse incision which was extended in both direction on the lower uterine segment was made with Metzenbaum scissors. Thereafter, the transverse myometrial incision was made on the uterine segment and it was extended laterally by finger traction. Then baby was delivered from the head immediately by gentle guide and extra abdominal compression. The incised corner of the uterus was clamped with sponge forceps. Rapid closure and bleeding control was performed at this space. Endometrium and myometrium was closed in continuous running suture with 1-0 vicryl. Disrupted uterine serosa were repaired by vicryl. And the remaining abdominal wall was closed layer by layer in the routine manner. insuranceConditions.productName: 진료기간 2025/02/19 의뢰사유 □ 의사 판단 주호소 의상 상병 분류기호 진료구분 □ 입원 외래 환자 요청 상기 환자는 3주 전 타병원에서 처음 alcoholic LC로 진단받은 자로 이에 대한 치료 위해 본원 소화기내과에 내원하였습니다. 그 전에는 알고 있는 기저 질환이 없다고 하였습니다. 환자는 아래 lab 상심한 hypoglycemia가 있고 CG도 상승되어 있어 이에 대한 상급 병원 진료가 필요하다고 판단되어 의뢰드리오니 바쁘신 가운데 고진선처 부탁드립니다. 감사합니다. 진료 소견 환자상태 및 진료소 결 긴급 진료 필요 여부 □ Y (구체적 긴급 진료 필요 사유 기술) 치료 · 검사 내역 CBC 10800(83.8%)-8.0-85k CRP 4.55 glucose 35 TB/DB 6.2/4.8 [AST/ALT 143/31 N 과거력 및 투익력 BUN/Cr 13.9/1.98 TG/LDL 459/38 ALP/GTP 154/290 amylase/lipase 109/124 [특종] 2025-02-19 MOR 김선삼 (0002) 71102453/M 11016279 AER 기타 가족력 알리지 유무 등 회신 요청 예 아니오 진료정보제공 한자동의서 본인은 상호 진료협력을 위해서 본인의 진료 결과 및 진료회신서 등의 진료정보를 의뢰의사에게 제공(인터넷 조회)하는 것을 동의합니다. 환자 또는 보호사 : 위와 같이 진료를 의뢰합니다. 환자와의 관계: 2025년 02월 19일 의료기관명칭 : 홍익병원 담당의사 면허번호: 115932 담당의사 성명: 송경한 의료기관대표시 귀하 1. 이 진료의뢰서는 협력기관간 진료의뢰 화 시범사업기관으로 지정받은 1단계 진료기관에서 환자의 상태에 따라 2단계 진료기관으로 요양급여 담당의사가 작성하며, 비용은 의뢰환자관리료의 소정점수에 포함됩니다. '진료의뢰서는 의사의 발급일로부터 7일(공휴일 제외)이내에 제출하여야 합니다. [특] 2025-02-19 MDR (0001) 김선삼 711024 53/M 11016279 AER 요양급여 회송(의뢰)서 연번호 2025-A0007152 건강
